name: The city of squares
description:
You are alone and without friends when you see a poster about "the city of squares".  In the hopes of making friends you embark on a journey to the city of squares. But you can not do it alone.

Controls

KeyActionConditionA S
Move sideways
When on land or in the air
SpaceJumpWhen on land
W A S DSet direction for swimming
When in water
SpaceMove in direction of WASD keys
When in water
TStart talkingWhen talk option pops up[Any key]
Continue conversationWhen in a conversation
